task: Coordinate a global virtual conference on climate change featuring live keynotes, interactive panels, cross-cultural networking events, localized workshops, eco-friendly product showcases, and real-time sustainability challenges.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Communicates with users to collect conference requirements and coordinates the planning and execution of the global virtual climate change conference.

agents.name: main_event_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Oversees the entire event, managing various specialized agents involved in organizing the conference tasks.

agents.name: keynote_manager_agent
agents.role: Handles keynote speaker scheduling, streaming, and broadcasting keynote speeches worldwide.

agents.name: remote_broadcast_agent
agents.role: Coordinates the necessary resources for broadcasting keynote speeches and other large events.

agents.name: panel_discussion_agent
agents.role: Organizes and moderates interactive panel discussions with experts from various climate change fields.

agents.name: panelist_selection_agent
agents.role: Selects suitable panelists for the discussions based on expertise and relevance to the topics.

agents.name: discussion_facilitation_agent
agents.role: Facilitates the discussion during panel sessions to ensure engaging and respectful dialogue.

agents.name: networking_event_agent
agents.role: Facilitates networking and cultural exchange events to connect attendees from diverse backgrounds.

agents.name: cultural_exchange_facilitator_agent
agents.role: Organizes and facilitates cross-cultural networking and exchange among conference participants.

agents.name: workshop_organization_agent
agents.role: Arranges regional workshops geared towards local issues related to climate change.

agents.name: product_showcase_agent
agents.role: Manages eco-friendly product showcases, ensuring compliance with sustainability standards.

agents.name: sustainability_challenge_agent
agents.role: Coordinates sustainability challenges with a global reach, tracking participant progress and leaderboard.

agents.name: performance_monitor_agent
agents.role: Monitors participant performance and feeds data to the leaderboard for sustainability challenges.

agents.name: leaderboard_tracking_agent
agents.role: Tracks and displays the real-time standings of participants in sustainability challenges.

agents.name: conference_analytics_agent
agents.role: Analyzes data from the event to assess engagement and impact, providing insights for future improvements.

agents.name: publicity_agent
agents.role: Handles promotion and dissemination of information about the conference through various media channels.

agents.name: language_localization_agent
agents.role: Translates and adapts conference materials for participants in diverse linguistic regions.

agents.name: security_protocol_agent
agents.role: Ensures the conference adheres to cybersecurity standards and data protection regulations.

agents.name: compliance_assessment_agent
agents.role: Assesses and ensures that conference activities meet regulatory compliance and industry standards.

agents.name: documentation_agent
agents.role: Compiles conference documents, including summaries and full reports of the sessions and outcomes.

tools.name: streaming_tool
tools.description: Enables the streaming and live broadcast of keynote speeches and other sessions to a global audience.

session_title.description: Title of the session to be streamed.

streaming_platform.description: Name of the platform to use for streaming.

tools.name: local_hosting_tool
tools.description: Supports the organization and hosting of workshops tailored to local communities.

available_facilitators.description: List of available facilitators for the workshop.

tools.name: eco_certification_tool
tools.description: Verifies eco-friendly products to ensure compliance with sustainability standards.

product_name.description: Name of the product to be certified.

certification_criteria.description: Criteria used to evaluate product sustainability.

tools.name: attendee_insight_tool
tools.description: Provides insights on attendee engagement, session popularity, and overall participation metrics.

session_id.description: ID of the session to analyze for attendee insights.

metrics_required.description: Types of metrics needed for analysis.

tools.name: social_media_promotion_tool
tools.description: Engages with social media platforms to promote the conference and continuously update attendees.

platform.description: Name of the social media platform for promotion.

promotion_content.description: Details of the content to be promoted.

tools.name: report_generation_tool
tools.description: Generates and compiles reports summarizing activities, sessions, and outcomes from the conference.

report_type.description: Type of report to be generated (summary, detailed, etc.).

sessions_included.description: List of sessions to include in the report.
